ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views

Class ClaimListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.ClaimListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class ClaimListActivity
extends Activity
implements ViewInterface
    This activity is the first activity that is displayed to the user. The activity contains the list of claims that the user has and allows the user to make modifications to the claim they choose.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called when the activity resumes from a background state. The method updates the screen mode and corresponding views depending on if the user is in approver or claimant mode.
